titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on aqueous catalytic preparations based on iron (III) toluenesulfonate.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on aqueous catalytic preparations based on iron (III) toluenesulfonate.
